name: Demo Payments API for Unreal Engine
name_original: Demo Payments API for Unreal Engine
description:
Link: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/61ac21d7512f446e80760df08...

If you have any questions or need support, you can join the Discord server below:

Discord channel

With this Payments API, you can set up payments in your game without any knowledge.

Everything has been simplified to the maximum, just drop a node in your BP and that's it!

Full documentation is available to help you configure them all correctly.

If you need any personal additions or modifications, please do not hesitate to contact us.

The identifiers in the captures are there for testing. The payment goes through the PayPal servers, the payment is therefore 100% secure.

Features:

  • Get a token
  • List of accepted currencies
  • Make payments
  • Set price, currency and product name
  • Choice between test and live mode
  • Platforms : PayPal inc.

Code Modules:

  •  Runtime Module : Payments API

Number of Blueprints: 2

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64, Win32, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Linux, MacOS, Windows 32 & 64-bits, Gear VR, Hololens, HTML, Oculus ans Steam VR

Documentation: PDF document

Explanation tutorial video: Youtube video
